website_summaries.verdict: Smell and slip aside, this is the is an affordable winner. It provides relief and is durable and stylish.
pros: Feels like memory foam and looks more like a rug than a mat
Available in several sizes and colors
cons: Occasionally slips and slides on carpet and other surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Surface does not hold up under use.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mat for 2 1/2 years and the entire surface of the mat started peeling off after the first year. Also, the mat is NOT color fast, using just a damp white rag and rubbing the mat you can see the maroon coloring transfer to the rag. I have several other gel mats of a similar price that I've had for 4 years now that show zero signs of wear even though they are in a higher traffic area. This is not a quality product that will last long term.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last!
customer_reviews.text: We have used the mat in the kitchen with either bare foot or soft house shoes only and the top of the mat started peeling and "shed" small pieces all over the floor after 20 months of use and we had to throw it out. Just thought others need to know this before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, purchased a second one for work and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my at home standing desk, even on carpet it works really well. I have tried multiple anti fatigue mats, twice the cost of this product and they have not performed as well for both intermittent use and long term use. Excellent product, purchased a second one for work and recommended it to my coworkers who have to stand on their feet all day.
customer_reviews.author: Way out west

customer_reviews.title: BEST KITCHEN MAT AVAILABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have a Spinal cord condition similar to MS. The pain in my legs and feet is 24/7 and quite unbearable. This mat, although a bit pricey, is worth every penny. Standing on this mat has relieved my pain so much, I have begun cooking again! This is huge! I like to eat healthy and love to cook. So I wanted to be more comfortable in the kitchen, but never thought this mat would have an unintended consequence of enabling me to cook healthy meals again! I strongly recommend this mat to anyone with leg or foot pain. You will find what seems like just a kitchen mat is so much more!
customer_reviews.author: Marty Segal

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with quality, comfort & delivery!!! Comes in variety of colors-the mocha was perfect for my kitchen cabinets, I would highly recommend this anti-fatigue mat for people who stand in place a lot.
customer_reviews.author: FROGsPower

customer_reviews.title: ... had this a couple of weeks and it is awesome. It appears as if it will hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this a couple of weeks and it is awesome. It appears as if it will hold up well. It shipped immediately and arrived in a large box so it was not folded or bent. I priced these similar mats and most of them were in the $80+ range so obviously the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mats were fine
customer_reviews.text: They slide on the floor. I have to keep moving them back where they were. Each mat came in a huge box for no reason. Otherwise I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Jean s

customer_reviews.title: Not anti-fatigue
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use while standing at my desk at work. After about 2 hours, no matter what shoes I wear, my feet hurt. This is not a significant difference from when I had no mat.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: This matt feels good but looks bad
customer_reviews.text: This matt feels good but looks bad. The top layer of vinyl color started chipping off soon afterward so I have white spots all over the mat where the top layer of vinyl has come off. This matt sits in front of my kitchen sink so the only thing that comes into contact with the mat are my feet, nothing hard or sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up to light wear.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for in front of my stove and one for in front of my sink. I cook and wash dishes every night (yes, no dishwasher). After less than a year of nightly use (less than an hour), the coating started to flake off along the little squares in the pattern. The corners of both mats curled up slightly, not severely but enough to make them a tripping hazard. During the time I used them, they never stayed in place on my tile floor. Lastly, when I ordered these, they were advertised with a "lifetime warranty," which the company kept hostage behind a favorable 5-star review. Bad all round. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: K in FL

customer_reviews.title: Cracked and became trash.
customer_reviews.text: Only use it by the kitchen sink....not a lot of use for a couple with no children at home. Very unhappy that it split and had to be thrown away in less than 18 months. We are "gentile" with things that we pay for and expected this to last longer. Loved it for the first year, but you won't get much use beyond that. BTW, it does not sit in the sun at all. We live in Pennsylvania and it's not by direct sun at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Company does not stand behind lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two different brands of anti-fatigue mat at the same time. The other brand was thrown away after 2.5 years because the edges curled and it became a tripping hazard. The Royal mat still lies flat, and I do find it comfortable to stand on, but the faux-leather material has started to flake off. The mat came with a lifetime warranty, but when I attempted to contact the company, my email bounced and the warranty page on their website no longer exists. This product was satisfactory until it started to flake, but I'm mostly annoyed that they offer a lifetime warranty that they had no intention of honoring. I will look for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy W.

customer_reviews.title: I really love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I really love this mat. It feels great to stand on. The only issue is that it shifts very often. I use this mat on a short carpet and it constantly shifts and I have to kick it back into place.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great to relieve standing joint pain
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth buying as a relief to fatigue when standing. I have used it for my standing desk, which turns into multi-hour standing gaming sessions. It helps reduce the pain you get from standing and relieves the joint discomfort you would receive normally. The only downside is the smell of the matt. I think it is common with the material these things are made of but it produced a noticeable odor for the first week that filled the room. Now it is not bad until you move it from its spot and back.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Okay, weird size/shape for my desk
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite mat. It could be a little thicker since I can still feel the floor through the mat. It is also unusually long but not that wide. It is awwkard to fit it in my corner cube.
customer_reviews.author: swef

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing! But received defective!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mat! It makes you feel good to do dishes 😉. One little thing - ours arrived with a little defect as shown on the image below. It is not that noticeable but I know it is there. UPDATED - The defect is now cracked and it is getting worse!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Material quality is terrible, started falling apart after just a few months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a family member and after just a few months of light use, the top material started to break down and flake off. I emailed the company (Equinox) and they merely offered a 10% discount on purchasing a new mat... This is obviously a product quality defect and it should be replaced by the company. I will NEVER purchase from this company again, and I urge you to avoid doing business with them!
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had found these anti-fatigue mats sooner
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 100 yr old farm house with oak floors in my kitchen. This winter I tripped on one of my rag rugs and hit that oak floor pretty hard, decided to find something safer and more comfortable to stand on. My daughter, who went to culinary school suggested these anti-fatigue mats, wish I had done it sooner. These mats are wonderful, my feet and legs no longer feel tired at the end of the day. I looked over a number of different brands and decided on Royal, the colors and price where a big factor at the start, now I am enjoying the quality.
customer_reviews.author: D.B.

customer_reviews.title: anti fatigue kitchen mat
customer_reviews.text: Have arthritis and plantar facisitis/sesamoiditis so the cushion effect of this mat was such a welcomed relief. Use it in front of my kitchen sink to take the pressure off of my feet, knees and back. So much more comfortable then 2 other mats I have tried. No bottoming out of the foam, which is what happened with another mat I had.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on old tired feet
customer_reviews.text: The mat arrived quickly and was well packed. It is incredibly nice to stand on. I have had orthopedic surgery and a hip replacement. I am on my feel a lot all day long. I actually take little breaks and stand on the pad just to give my feet a break. It would be nice to have a few more placed strategically in the places I spend most of my time. The only problem is that more and more I have to share it with our old dog who seems to find it as soft and warm as I do.
customer_reviews.author: GoodDog

customer_reviews.title: I've tried to love this for a long time and I just can't ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to love this for a long time and I just can't do it! It NEVER stays in place and we have to move it back numerous times a day, regardless if we've stood on it for a minute or ten and it doesn't even matter the number of times. As crazy as it sounds, it seems like it moves on its own. I purchased another mat, which also happens to be decorative, at a lower price and it is wonderful. This was just a waste of money and I'm ready to just cut my losses and buy one that actually stays in place and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Yarovsky

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - Poor performance and poor returns
customer_reviews.text: The mat itself is not THAT comfortable. I found it a bit too hard. The bigger issue was it slid all over the place- absolutely useless and, considering how many times I tripped near or on to my stove, downright dangerous! THEN there was the drama of the return. This is eligible for the UPS "no box no label" return. Except you actually need a box- despite Amazon saying the exact opposite. My "free" return cost me $8. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased Two Of These For Our Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Goodbye sore feet when cooking in the Kitchen, hello comfort! I'm Italian, so Cooking and Espresso making are expected after you turn 7 years old. Our home has a hard stone tile and when making Sauce on Sunday's, I'd get cranky because my feet would get sore and my knee's ached. That was until we purchased two of these! One in front of the stove and one in front of the Espresso machine, and Viola, no more pain and crankiness! Highly recommended if you spend a lot of time on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: John C Bruccolieri

customer_reviews.title: It feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Just like many people have mentioned, it feels wonderful and the beveled edges are a small yet important feature. I'm not sure what rubbery smell a lot of people noticed because there was no smell to mine at all.
customer_reviews.author: Yep

customer_reviews.title: ND
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful! My comfort mat was delivered in just three days a came in a great box. But, best of all it's quite an improvement over the old cloth mat I had before this. My new Anti-Fatigue Comfort Mat makes my whole kitchen look better. It's heavenly to stand on and it stays neatly in place for a safer feeling. Plus it just looks tidier than my rugs did on the floor at the kitchen sink. Thanks for making such a nice mat! -CJH
customer_reviews.author: Donald Howland

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, mat is not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Mats have not help up esthetically. That is still very supportive and comfortable but unable to keep due to the fact it looks tacky. I have posted photo for viewing.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived promptly but when delivered was thrown in the front of my 1.7 acre property like a piece of trash. Thankfully I found it and it was not damaged. The mat itself is very comfortable to stand on. The thickness is considerable and when walking onto it when I forget it's there I stumble a bit. The surface is tapered to prevent full trip but I think it would be nicer if it wasn't quite so thick. Overall though it is great to stand on while working in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Rox

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and so comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 - for work and home and I love it!! I was referred to this brand from someone at work who had a standing desk and he had his for over 2 years when I met him and we talked about it. I hate sitting around and prefer to stand most of the day, esp at work and this is so durable and the material has held up so well. I have spilled some things accidentally on it and it does not matter. It is more expensive than others on market but so worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mat just a tad over a year ago, and it was great while it lasted. About a month ago, it began peeling up in spots. Now, it's starting to look pretty bad. I tried contacting Royal about this so-called "lifetime warranty", but I've yet to receive a response. I suppose I should have just spent a bit more on a higher quality one. I don't want to have to buy a new one every year.
customer_reviews.author: KSM

customer_reviews.title: This mat is very comfortable to stand on
customer_reviews.text: This mat is very comfortable to stand on. The downside for us was it has a couple small indents that have not come out. I think these could lead to holes in the mat.
customer_reviews.author: scott reiley

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't everything I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Searched for a kitchen mat that would fit in front of my sink. That was challenging because of my kitchen layout. Finally found this which I carefully measured and hoped would be the solution. The quality is fine. But it wouldn't stay in place and I had to try different types of mat/rug adhesive to prevent it from slipping. My only other complaint is it doesn't clean well. I'm still trying to determine what I should use since dish soap and other every day cleaning solutions don't seem to work well.
customer_reviews.author: latempe

customer_reviews.title: Now I know what people are talking about
customer_reviews.text: I’ve know a few people who had similar products like this, one of my sisters in particular. Since I do a lot of my cooking and washing of dishes standing (as well as part of my job), I thought I’d give this mat a try. I keep it by my kitchen sink; if they go on sale again I might buy a smaller version for when I’m prepping the food I’m going to cook. It’s easy to clean; however, it looks soiled quickly, probably because it’s black. I’d give it a 4.5 out of 5 stars actually.
customer_reviews.author: ItalianHomeChef

customer_reviews.title: Failure to hold up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rug in November of 2015. Initially, I loved it! Looked good and felt good to the feet. Sadly, now nearly three years later, the surface is breaking down into small black pieces. We have no animals or children who are providing extra wear on this rug. I would expect this product to last much longer and not need to replace after three years! Nancy from California
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Now I can last for 3-4 hours without feeling like I've stood up for 3-4 hours
customer_reviews.text: I put this in the kitchen right under the stove since that is where I spend the most time in and has made a huge difference when cooking for long hours. I would usually get pain within an hour of standing up. Now I can last for 3-4 hours without feeling like I've stood up for 3-4 hours. I'm heavily considering grabbing another one to put under the sink since right now I would switch the mats when it's time to wash the dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Paul lalo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for standing
customer_reviews.text: Like this mat, it's very comfortable for standing on my feet. The other reviews about being too slippery seem to be exaggerated to me, it does move a little on my tile floor but it's occasional and slight. Great chocolate color, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but did not last
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mat 3 years ago and it is looking very shabby. The top is cracking and looks worn. I have another brand mat (Smart Step) that is 2 years old and still looks like new. Both mats are in the kitchen right next to each other. The Smart Step seems to be a much higher quality mat. The Smart Step was also much more expensive, but it is larger too. I will buy a Smart Step brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: GregO

customer_reviews.title: Great Comfort Mat
customer_reviews.text: Had been using one of these at a stand desk for some time and decided to see how they'd work in the kitchen. I like to cook and spend a lot of time at the cutting board on our island. These are the best comfort mats at the best price. Wouldn't ask for anything else. Pretty much much everything I have tried has blown out or the asking price was over $100 for the quality that these deliver.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a smaller Royal mat before in black. I loved it so much that I decided I need a second one to help my feet when I wash dishes. As far as wear and tear I see no issues even though my Roomba vacuumes it 2-3 times a day. It helps my feet to feel less tired. The color however, is not the same in real life. This is brown and not red or burgundy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonka

customer_reviews.title: looked just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This product came as advertised, looked just like the picture, felt and looked great. The only problem, and it wasn't anything AT ALL to do with the product, was that I purchased this for my wife as a Christmas present. When she opened up the huge box that it came in and saw what it was, she was not pleased...to say the least. She was totally expecting a puppy, a TV, a robot, or something completely non-practical. Again no fault of the product, in fact if/when my wife leaves me for being a bonehead, and I need a set of mats, I'll buy these for myself and be very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful antifatigue mats!
customer_reviews.text: These mats help me tremendously! I can now stand and cook in my kitchen or wash dishes way longer without my legs and back hurting as much. These mats are wonderful. Only thing is they scoot around so have to put a nonslip liner underneath them unless you want to keep repositioning them and also be careful not to drop anything on them--I dropped a lid on them and it did make a gash so the covering isn't thick enough to withstand much force!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Collins

customer_reviews.title: The color keeps chipping of
customer_reviews.text: Loved the mat when I purchased the first one so I bought a second. Now the color keeps chipping off and makes quite a mess. I called the company and was told this was not covered by warranty. Going to try a different company.
customer_reviews.author: bemore24

customer_reviews.title: Shipped folded in half and is permanently damaged
customer_reviews.text: Nice mat and perfect size but they shipped it folded and it caused damage to the mat. I have laid it out for a few weeks and applied heat hoping to get rid of the creases. It has improved but is still damaged. I considered returning but I am sure they would ship a new one in the same manner. Care of an anti fatigue mat explicitly states to not fold because it can cause permanent damage.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, my cats love it. It has relived pain from my feet from standing long hours, which now makes my cooking more delicious. Happy feet, happy food :)
customer_reviews.author: Trinushka

customer_reviews.title: So sad this does not last long at all
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift from my family. We do not even wear shoes in the house and it started ripping on the top surface after only a couple months. Since we couldn't afford a new one and this one doesn't have a guarantee, we started putting black duct tape over the tears. As you can see from the photos, it kept tearing more and more that soon, is has become more tape than mat. The other photo shows another tear before I taped it. This is such an eye sore that it is embarrassing to say the least. Thought I should warm anyone this season if they were considering a gift.
customer_reviews.author: MrVideo

customer_reviews.title: Slips constantly
customer_reviews.text: Slips all over the place. I'm always re-adjusting. It needs to go back.
customer_reviews.author: Suemcl

customer_reviews.title: FLOATING...ABSLUTELY LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I can't answer the three questions as I've owned the product a couple. I am now trying to take out all the wall to wall carpet and replace it with this matting....it is a pure pleasure pleasure to stand on. When I arrive back at my business I'm having the staff apply this product possible...workshops, sales counters, etc.
customer_reviews.author: waterdog

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for those with lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have ever made for my kitchen! I spend a lot of time washing dishes and cooking, and standing on that hard floor was murder on my back. After using this for a few days, my lower back pain almost completely went away. It is worth it's weight in gold. I have had it for about 2 years now and the only reason I am looking to replace it is because our dishwasher started leaking, and the water was able to hide underneath the mat. Take care to keep it dry and you will love it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Renate Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it is not well made. Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This is the second mat I bought of this brand as the first one ripped. I thought it might be a fluke but this one did too. Only after 15 months. I wrote the manufacturer TWICE asking about their warranty policy but no response. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Lady

customer_reviews.title: this is so much better than a dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: bought this because i prefer to wash dishes manually instead of using the expensive dishwasher I bought during my very expensive home renovations. anyways, my feet don't hurt when I'm washing my favorite orange cereal bowl so 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Johnson Folks

customer_reviews.title: Must have for tile or terrazzo floors!
customer_reviews.text: I finally got the opportunity to really use this after knee surgery. This mat is so comfortable! We have terrazzo floors in our house, and it’s brutal on knees and feet. I’ve had several different anti-fatigue mats, including very expensive gel mats and this is the most comfortable one I’ve found. I will be ordering another one very soon.
customer_reviews.author: CharleneG

customer_reviews.title: Great pad to ease feet!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome mat to place anywhere you're standing for long periods of time to ease foot pain. It can be placed around the house in front the sink or in the garage. We have this mat at our storefront and its a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Nice mats but too expensive and they don’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and comfort of these mats and they fit well in the kitchen. However, these mats don’t stay in place as advertised. You can easily lose your balance because the plastic bottom has no functional grip. Now I have to buy double sided tape to keep them from sliding around on my wood laminate floor. I would not recommend these mats for that reason and the price is too high.
customer_reviews.author: Mister B

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I am having great success with this product. I stand for long periods of time and this mat has taken a great deal of the stress load off of my back. I highly recommend it, especially for the price. I can't rate its durability since I have only had it for a relatively short time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Braga

customer_reviews.title: Don't use on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our kitchen with tile floors. The mat slips and slides freely on hard surfaces. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Cucharo

customer_reviews.title: It looks horrible. We have cleaned it with water only - ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this mat less than a year and it started peeling all over the place. It looks horrible. We have cleaned it with water only - no chemicals at all. I would not recommend this to anyone. It's a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Miz B

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a similar Amazonbasics mat. This one is lasting longer (the old one started separating at the edge), comfort is no issue. It does slide a bit on the tile floor, but no more than others have. Pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: I bought it with my desk riser and I couldn't be happier with both
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with this mat. I bought it with my desk riser and I couldn't be happier with both. Nice and lightweight so it's easy to move around between sitting and standing. And makes standing so much more comfortable and I'm able to stand longer as to compared to standing without it. If you stand a lot, it's a great mat!
customer_reviews.author: Hall_O_Qween

customer_reviews.title: Great on the legs!
customer_reviews.text: Great mat. Ordered one and loved it so I purchased another. Standing on these mats while Cooking makes all the difference in the world for me. Highly recommended.i have one by my stove and the other by my sink To stand on when washing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Mz. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Great mat and at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: I stand all day at my workstation. I have bought mats before but this one makes a big difference in how my legs and lower back feel by the end of the day. Best anti-fatigue mat I have owned so far and the price is right!
customer_reviews.author: Wynette Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Odor!
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfort, color and the size of this mat but it has a terrible odor! It moves around on my tile floor and every time I go to put it back in place the odor gets on my hands too! I've tried to wipe it down but it still smells bad. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Twilley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable while Washing Dishes
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mat. Every time I step on it while I’m doing the dishes my feet feel relieved. Don’t wear skinny heels on it thought because they will poke a hole. Update! Just bought a second one for my family for Christmas. We like to put a cloth mat over this for extra squish and warm ness.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Fine if you want it to last a few years
customer_reviews.text: Mat was fine while it lasted. The fabric started peeling after about 18 months of use and has only gotten worse since. For the money, it’s too expensive to have to keep replacing every two years when there are better mats at comparable prices with lifetime guarantees. Will not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Bernier

customer_reviews.title: Great for standing with a bad knee.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the support this mat gives to when I stand by my stove cooking. I have a bad knee and this soft but sturdy mat makes my comfort level go up exponentially. Be sides that I have to small dogs, Dachshunds and they have given it their approval by standing right next to me while a cook and loving.the mat.
customer_reviews.author: artist

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mat, better than the ones you buy in a cheap big box store! My only complaint is that if I move it from the computer to the kitchen and back, my kitchen floor is really slippery where the mat was. I don't know why? Otherwise, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fara Cochran

customer_reviews.title: comfortable if not uber attractive - update = looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: comfort level is good. Less red in the color than I expected and it is very thick. overall good purchase not sure it looks that attractive in the kitchen but really purchased for comfort. UPDATE: color is just a covering that is now flaking off and the mat looks terrible. Would not purchase again. It's too bad because the cushioning is good but it didn't hold up
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent
customer_reviews.text: This mat is amazing, bought for my wife who suffers with neuropathy but loves to cook. It cushions your feet, keeps them warm on cold tile or hardwood and after a year of rolling it over multiple times daily with my wheelchair it still looks brand new. The price at around $40 seemed a bit much when I purchased but is worth every cent after a year of abuse. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Jay Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Seems just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This is my first anti-fatigue mat. I find the surface comfortable when in socks and it appears durable. I don't think I'd use this if I was wearing shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Strong toxic odor
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable mat but the odor is strong. I left this mat outside for 1 week to get rid of the strong toxic smell but it didn't work. I will not be using this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: PoshNtheCountry

customer_reviews.title: The mat is incredibly comfortable both with and without shoes on
customer_reviews.text: The mat is incredibly comfortable both with and without shoes on. It especially helps me since I have a stand up desk at work. It's actually helped so much that I've purchased 3 (1 before and 2 just recently) since co-workers have asked me to purchase them one after standing on mine and i'm getting ready to purchase another one. Thanks again Equinox International!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Wesselhoft

customer_reviews.title: Stop waiting and buy this already!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this in the kitchen for quite a while now and wish I'd bought it years before and saved myself the foot strain. It's SO nice to walk and stand on compared to the kitchen floor. Looks great too and has stood up like a champ!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I am super happy with my new comfort mat! I have painful arthritis in my feet and this mat helps a lot. Super soft and comfortable to stand on while cooking and doing dishes in my kitchen. I am very happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend this mat to anyone with problems with standing on hard surfaces. My feet are very happy now!
customer_reviews.author: Mema

customer_reviews.title: SLIPPERY!
customer_reviews.text: This mat is ok. Nice looking but slips all over my floor! I even put a rug pad under (which was annoying to have to do) and it still slips on the pad! So ridiculous! The bottom is ridged. Dont know if that has anything to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Decent foam comfort mat. Foam could be a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent foam comfort mat. Foam could be a bit more supple, but it definitely improves standing comfort on concrete and asphalt. I've used this both indoors and outdoors at over a couple dozen events in the past year, and it's showing no obvious sign of degradation.
customer_reviews.author: George Coghill

customer_reviews.title: Love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday and not sure why some reviews state it is not durable. I wash dishes by hand atleast 3 times a day (life a stay at home mom) and my mat looks like new. It is super easy to clean you just wipe anything right off and helps with my back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jnt_5

customer_reviews.title: Feet and Knees Feel Better
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, but was in a remarkably large box. I selected the black color, is as pictured only big enough for 1 person to use at a time. Not as supportive on my feet and knees as some of the more expensive ones but enough of a marked improvement over my hard wood floors that there is no pain after an hour of meal prep and clean up. Good value for the money, relatively light weight but doesn't slide around and the texture pattern works well to prevent slips when it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Amil

customer_reviews.title: ADDENDUM.... Thee Best
customer_reviews.text: This mat the BEST 1 out of 4 we've bought! It's so cushiony & comfortable! UPDATE! I'VE USED THIS MAT FOR 7 MONTHS. No longer #1 mat with me. It does NOT have lifetime warranty! The camel color is pulling away from the foam already. Seller said that problem isn't included in the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: If you stand for any length of time, use this mat
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable when standing for long periods of time. I stand in front of an easel when painting and the floor is concrete. My feet and legs were starting to ache from standing on concrete so this mat has helped so much. The price was very reasonable. I purchased this based on an online recommendation. So far very satisfied but I probably could have used a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Betty S Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I've started standing up in my home study when I work on my computers (2-3 hours per day at least) and makes a big positive difference on my feet and my rear end (as I seldom sit any longer - sitting is the new smoking they say).
customer_reviews.author: John Anderson

customer_reviews.title: No worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Even at $80 off, it was not worth the price. There was no backing to keep it from slipping when placed on a hard surface such as a kitchen floor or bathroom floor, where safety is a concern. I even place a slip-proof rug under it but it didn't work. It was too much trouble to be bothered.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Rice

customer_reviews.title: I am really pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I am really pleased with this product. It is just what I needed to place at my kitchen sink. Very nice looking and is the ultimate anti-fatigue mat. It was only available in two colors, but the price as good. Would recommend this mat to friends.
customer_reviews.author: D D

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Anti-Fatigue Mat!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best anti-fatigue mat I've ever used! We use it in front of our kitchen sink. It cleans up easily and is very thick and comfortable. I would highly recommend it to anyone. I do wish they had more color options to choose from because I would buy more for other rooms in my house. 2/6/17 Update - Over the holidays everyone that stepped on the mat commented on how awesome it was. It is still as comfortable and attractive as it was in 2015 when I purchased it. You can't go wrong with this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jobelle

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat for feet!
customer_reviews.text: My brother (who was a restaurant manager for twenty years, has plantar fasciitis, and is 215lbs), has never had a better anti-fatigue mat beneath his feet. Great utilitarian gift!
customer_reviews.author: TMcC

customer_reviews.title: Relieves foot pressure
customer_reviews.text: I am diabetic. I get pressure wounds to .my feet. This mat helps support my feet when sitting and they are on a hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Adventurer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great mat for standing for several hours
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing some work in grocery stores where I have customer sample products and I have to work 4 hour shifts. I was having a very hard time standing for that long but having this mat has really helped. It is lightweight, comfortable and the price was much better than mats I found elsewhere that were far more expensive. I'm so glad that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Suslow

customer_reviews.title: No more back & leg pain.
customer_reviews.text: The concrete floor I have to stand on to work really kills my back and legs. After a few hours of work on such a hard surface, it can take me a couple of days to recover. I turned to this mat for relief and haven't been disappointed. I have only tried it a couple times, for a couple of hours at a time, but clearly felt the difference. Next morning: no pain in the back or the legs. I recommend this if you have to stand for many hours on a hard surface.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard Derroitte

customer_reviews.title: Soft & cushiony but the smell
customer_reviews.text: They were soft and may have lasted for a while, but the mildew/mold smell right out the box made everyone in my home sick. It never went away even after airing out for days. Maybe it was a return or had been wet somehow. Had to return it for that alone.
customer_reviews.author: L.Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Solid investment and great price
customer_reviews.text: Makes cooking and doing the dishes a little less stressful. My back and feet have significantly less pain thanks to these great mats. Game changer
customer_reviews.author: amazonqueen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Comfort that last all day!
customer_reviews.text: I made the right choice! I bought this mat for my new stand up desk. This mat is perfect! I plan on buying another one for my kitchen after we finished remodeling.
customer_reviews.author: JSLUVME

customer_reviews.title: Cushy and comfy for standing - love this!
customer_reviews.text: I tried one of these at a friend's house and HAD to have one! I tucked it right up to the kitchen sink and it's a cushy surprise and nice break from hard floors. I need to get another for in front of the stove. I never knew how much I needed this thing - it's that wonderful!! Highly recommend and love this pad!!
customer_reviews.author: Sj773Top Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant Kitchen Soft but Lighter Weight
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed at the sink washing up by hand. I shouldn’t have waited so long to but it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend! Non-slip & soft, thick. Great for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Great item and price. Put this in my kitchen to replace a mat that was supposed to be slip proof and was not at all! The added plus of this "Comfort Mat" is that it is thick and doesn't compress down to the hard floor. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Lin G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price point but not non-skid
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price point. I am so pleased with the quality and how much stress it takes off my back. I have one in front of my stove, and liked it enough for a 2nd in front of my sink.Just know that they don’t exactly have a non-slip surface, so if you or your loved ones are a fall-risk, wear shoes while standing on this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: This Mat Takes the Pain Out of Stationary Stand Up Jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Used it on a steel mini scaffold so I could enclose my porch for the winter. Standing on the steel scaffold used to kill my knees and legs in a very short time. This mat took the pain out this task. It's a nice thick mat that works good.
customer_reviews.author: Macabee

customer_reviews.title: excellent support
customer_reviews.text: got a standing desk in my office. the floors are "carpeted" but may as well be standing on concrete. this is excellent. standing on it now while typing this review. perfect accessory to my standing desk.
customer_reviews.author: Nole

customer_reviews.title: Works great but smells awful for a long time after purchase
customer_reviews.text: The mat works great my only issue is it stinks pretty bad, people in my office were complaining about the weird smell several weeks after purchase. I still occasionally get a whiff of the awful smell when I step on it.
customer_reviews.author: ANTHONY YORK

customer_reviews.title: The mat was shipped quickly. I recently started working ...
customer_reviews.text: The mat was shipped quickly. I recently started working at a sit/stand desk. I had high hopes that the mat would make a significant difference when I stand at my desk. I've found that the mat is a little more effective when I take my shoes off than when I stand on it in my shoes. I debated between a 3 and a 4 for my rating and chose 4 based on the speed of delivery and it does make a difference. I wish the difference was more evident.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mat about a year ago and it's already starting to peel. Contacted the seller and they told me they couldn't do anything because my warranty only covered manufacturer defects. Interesting they deny my claim without asking one question to determine if it really was a defect or not.
customer_reviews.author: K Hoeflich

customer_reviews.title: So far my wife and I like the mat
customer_reviews.text: So far my wife and I like the mat. It has the right amount of support and comfort. We like the beveled edges and that it doesn't slide under us. The reason we bought it is because my wife gets back fatigue while cook prepping, but we haven't had a chance to really test that out yet...but see no reason why it won't alleviate that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Matysiak

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic anti-fatigue mat
customer_reviews.text: This anti-fatigue mat is fantastic. It relieves a lot of pressure on my feet. I purchased several of these mats to use around the house. I use one for my PlayStation VR area, one by the stove, one for washing dishes, and one by my ironing board. My feet are much happier now.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Stand up easy
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I got it to go with my new stand up desk platform. I stand on this all day. It’s especially good when you have no shoes on. It’s seen no tear or wear at all since I’ve bought it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn N

product_meta.title: Royal Anti-Fatigue Comfort Mat - 20 in x 39 in x 3/4 in - Ergonomic Multi Surface, Non-Slip - Waterproof All-Purpose Luxurious Comfort - For Kitchen, Bathroom or Workstations - Black
feature_bullets: THE MULTI-SURFACE, ALL PURPOSE STANDING MAT: Ergonomic standing mat works on marble, wood, laminate or any type of flooring and will never flip, bend, or fold; This all purpose mat soft for comfort but durable enough to withstand spills, or kitchen disasters Modern clean design makes it appropriate for kitchen, bathroom, office, and commercial spaces such as hotels, airlines, and industrial facilities.

RELIEVES PRESSURE & FATIGUE: Anti-fatigue floor mats relieve up to 40% of the pressure on your feet, knees, lower back, and joints while doing standing work; Whether you’re cooking a family meal or working at your standing desk, you’ll feel like you’re standing on a cloud; Less fatigue equals more energy

OPTIMAL CUSHIONING: Our kitchen comfort mats are ¾ inch thick and provide optimal support and comfort during long standing periods; Ergonomically designed to increase stability and reduce pressure on your feet, knees, and joints; Mats are not made to withstand pressure from pointed High Heeled Shoes. If you step on the mats with High Heeled shoes, you may risk puncturing

PERFECT SIZE: At 20 x 39, Standing mats provide ample cushioned workspace when used as a standing desk mat, kitchen chef mat, and other anti-fatigue mat application; Choice of 4 beautiful colors to complement you décor Jet Black, Caramel Brown, Burgundy or Sand Beige.

SAFE & ECO-FRIENDLY: Commercial-grade phthalate-free comfort floor mats are puncture and tear resistant and feature a textured surface & tapered edges for stability; Waterproof and non-slip standing mats can be vacuumed or cleaned as needed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,494 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
